name: buble
description: The blazing fast, batteries-included ES2015 compiler

scripts.test:register: echo '"use strict";' | cat - src/program/Node.js | sed 's/export default/module.exports =/' | node -r ./register.js
scripts.test:full: npm run test && npm run test:register && npm run lint
scripts.test:bundlers: npm run test:bundlers:rollup && npm run test:bundlers:webpack && npm run test:bundlers:parcel
scripts.test:bundlers:webpack: cd test/bundlers && mkdir -p node_modules && npm i webpack && node webpack.js && test "$(node dist/main.js)" = 'var x = 4'
scripts.test:bundlers:parcel: cd test/bundlers && mkdir -p node_modules && npm i parcel && npx parcel build index.js --no-cache && test "$(node dist/index.js)" = 'var x = 4'
scripts.lint: eslint bin/ src/ test/test.js test/utils/ register.js rollup.*.js scripts/

author: Rich Harris
